tasks.prompt: You are a DevOps engineer responsible for setting up a CI/CD pipeline for a microservices application. Design and document a complete CI/CD workflow using modern tools. Include stages for testing, building, security scanning, and deployment to multiple environments (dev, staging, production).

Design a 12-week online course curriculum for teaching Python programming to beginners with no prior coding experience. Include learning objectives, weekly topics, hands-on projects, assessments, and recommended resources. Focus on practical applications and student engagement.

As a risk analyst at a bank, evaluate the credit risk of a proposed $5M business loan to a manufacturing company. Analyze financial ratios, industry trends, collateral value, and macroeconomic factors. Provide a risk rating and lending recommendation with supporting analysis.
